document.full_text: vermont governor peter shumlin declared a state of emergency on thursday, as lake champlain was forecast to crest at record levels by the weekend, officials said.
document.title: vermont's lake champlain to crest at highest since 1869
lines_and_colors: vermont governor peter shumlin declared a state of emergency on thursday, as lake champlain was forecast to crest at record levels by the weekend, officials said.
